channel.title: GER:PUM on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in GER:PUM on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Pinault Family Is Exploring Options for Puma, Including a Sale
item.description: The Pinault family has reached out to potential buyers of Puma SE after the German sports brand lost about half of its market value in the past year, according to people familiar with the matter.
